name: Buzz Together
description:
This game is currently in beta phases, i am trying to see what i can do to make the game more fun before the end of the brackeys game jam 2021.1

In this game, you play as a bee fighting enemies with other bees (AI's) in a wave-based top-down experience.

FEATURES

- Craft upgrades for your bees using items you get from crates and enemies

- Create bee AI's to help you fight

- Fight through 30 waves of enemies

- Buzz Together and have fun!
